 External libraries:

A simple audio player to play mp3 from phone


Features:
 * Best notepad full free application
 * Create infinity number of folders to storing your notes.
 * Offline notepad where you can easily write thoughts without using the internet.
 * Notepad with protection. You can protect your notes with a password.
 * Adjust the color of your text for notes or entries in the diary.
 * Share your notes with other applications.
 * Check spelling in all your notes.
 * An unincorporated notepad.
 * Easy application that loads instantly.
 * Free diary and notepad for smartphones on android.
